desc: Online Boutique for Pampered Pets! Choose the Best Fashions and Accessories for your Pet! Designer coats, dresses and accessories for your fur baby. Each of our products are hand-picked, of the highest quality with safety in mind for your pet. Get FREE Shipping on orders over $50. We have Pet Gifts and Gift Cards.

layout.text: We pride ourselves in providing the highest quality products for our furry family members. Our selection of dog shirts, dog dresses, dog hoodies, dog jackets,  dog collars, dog leashes, dog harnesses and other fabulous pet supplies have all been selected for their quality and style. Subscribe to be one of 'The Pack' and receive exclusive discounts, helpful insights, and more cuteness than anyone can handle!
